Boots.description:
+15 Magic Penetration

UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed

(Magic Penetration: Magic damage is increased by ignoring an amount of the target's Magic Resist equal to Magic Penetration.)

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
Boots.name: Sorcerer's Shoes
Boots.plaintext: Enhances Movement Speed and magic damage
Boots.sanitizedDescription: +15 Magic Penetration UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed (Magic Penetration: Magic damage is increased by ignoring an amount of the target's Magic Resist equal to Magic Penetration.) (Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

Boots.description:
+25 Magic Resist

UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed
UNIQUE Passive - Tenacity: Reduces the duration of stuns, slows, taunts, fears, silences, blinds, polymorphs, and immobilizes by 35%.

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

Boots.plaintext: Increases Movement Speed and reduces duration of disabling effects

Boots.description:
+25 Armor

UNIQUE Passive: Blocks 10% of the damage from basic attacks.
UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

Boots.plaintext: Enhances Movement Speed and reduces incoming basic attack damage

Elixirs.description:
Level 9 required to purchase.

Click to Consume: Grants +40 Ability Power, 15 bonus Mana Regen per 5 seconds and Sorcery for 3 minutes.

Sorcery: Damaging a champion or turret deals 25 bonus True Damage. This effect has a 5 second cooldown versus champions but no cooldown versus turrets.

(Only one Flask effect may be active at a time.)
Elixirs.name: Elixir of Sorcery
Elixirs.plaintext: Temporarily grants Ability Power and Bonus Damage to champions and turrets.
Elixirs.sanitizedDescription: Level 9 required to purchase. Click to Consume: Grants +40 Ability Power, 15 bonus Mana Regen per 5 seconds and Sorcery for 3 minutes. Sorcery: Damaging a champion or turret deals 25 bonus True Damage. This effect has a 5 second cooldown versus champions but no cooldown versus turrets. (Only one Flask effect may be active at a time.)

Endgame Items.description:
+300 Health
+400 Mana
+60 Ability Power

Passive: Grants +20 Health, +40 Mana, and +4 Ability Power per stack (max +200 Health, +400 Mana, and +40 Ability Power). Grants 1 stack per minute (max 10 stacks).
UNIQUE Passive - Valor's Reward: Upon leveling up, restores 150 Health and 200 Mana over 8 seconds.

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
Endgame Items.name: Rod of Ages
Endgame Items.plaintext: Greatly increases Health, Mana, and Ability Power
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +300 Health +400 Mana +60 Ability Power Passive: Grants +20 Health, +40 Mana, and +4 Ability Power per stack (max +200 Health, +400 Mana, and +40 Ability Power). Grants 1 stack per minute (max 10 stacks). UNIQUE Passive - Valor's Reward: Upon leveling up, restores 150 Health and 200 Mana over 8 seconds. (Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

Endgame Items.description:
+100 Ability Power
+50 Armor

UNIQUE Active - Stasis: Champion becomes invulnerable and untargetable for 2.5 seconds, but is unable to move, attack, cast spells, or use items during this time (90 second cooldown).
Endgame Items.name: Zhonya's Hourglass
Endgame Items.plaintext: Activate to become invincible but unable to take actions
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +100 Ability Power +50 Armor UNIQUE Active - Stasis: Champion becomes invulnerable and untargetable for 2.5 seconds, but is unable to move, attack, cast spells, or use items during this time (90 second cooldown).

Endgame Items.description:
+80 Ability Power
+300 Health

UNIQUE Passive - Eyes of Pain: +15 Magic Penetration
UNIQUE Passive: Dealing spell damage applies a damage-over-time effect for 3 seconds that deals bonus magic damage equal to 2% of the target's current Health per second. This bonus damage is doubled against movement-impaired units and capped at 100 damage per second vs. monsters.

(A unit is movement-impaired if it is slowed, stunned, taunted, feared, or immobilized.)

(Magic Penetration: Magic damage is increased by ignoring an amount of the target's Magic Resist equal to Magic Penetration.)

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
Endgame Items.name: Liandry's Torment
Endgame Items.plaintext: Spell damage burns enemies for a portion of their Health
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +80 Ability Power +300 Health UNIQUE Passive - Eyes of Pain: +15 Magic Penetration UNIQUE Passive: Dealing spell damage applies a damage-over-time effect for 3 seconds that deals bonus magic damage equal to 2% of the target's current Health per second. This bonus damage is doubled against movement-impaired units and capped at 100 damage per second vs. monsters. (A unit is movement-impaired if it is slowed, stunned, taunted, feared, or immobilized.) (Magic Penetration: Magic damage is increased by ignoring an amount of the target's Magic Resist equal to Magic Penetration.) (Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

+120 Ability Power

UNIQUE Passive: Increases Ability Power by 35%.

Endgame Items.description:
+400 Health
+60 Magic Resist
+150% Base Health Regen
+10% Cooldown Reduction

UNIQUE Passive: Increases all healing received by 20%.
Endgame Items.name: Spirit Visage
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +400 Health +60 Magic Resist +150% Base Health Regen +10% Cooldown Reduction UNIQUE Passive: Increases all healing received by 20%.

Endgame Items.description:
+400 Health
+100 Ability Power

UNIQUE Passive: Damaging spells and abilities apply a Movement Speed reduction to enemies based on the spell type:

Single Target: 40% reduction for 1.5 seconds.
Area of Effect: 40% reduction for 1 seconds
Damage over Time or Multi-hit: 20% reduction for 1 seconds.
Summoned Minions: 20% reduction for 1 seconds.

(If a spell fits in more than one category, it uses the weakest slow value.)
Endgame Items.name: Rylai's Crystal Scepter
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +400 Health +100 Ability Power UNIQUE Passive: Damaging spells and abilities apply a Movement Speed reduction to enemies based on the spell type: Single Target: 40% reduction for 1.5 seconds. Area of Effect: 40% reduction for 1 seconds Damage over Time or Multi-hit: 20% reduction for 1 seconds. Summoned Minions: 20% reduction for 1 seconds. (If a spell fits in more than one category, it uses the weakest slow value.)

+60 Ability Power
+25 Magic Resist
+20% Cooldown Reduction
+100% Base Mana Regen

UNIQUE Passive: Restores 30% of maximum Mana on kill or assist.
UNIQUE Passive - Mana Font: Restores 2% of missing Mana every 5 seconds.

Starting Items.description:
Limited to 1 Trinket.

Active: Places a Stealth Ward that lasts 60 seconds (120 second cooldown).

At level 9, this ward's duration increases to 120 seconds.

Limit 3 Stealth Wards on the map per player.

(Trinkets cannot be used in the first 30 seconds of a game. Selling a Trinket will disable Trinket use for 120 seconds).
Starting Items.name: Warding Totem (Trinket)
Starting Items.sanitizedDescription: Limited to 1 Trinket. Active: Places a Stealth Ward that lasts 60 seconds (120 second cooldown). At level 9, this ward's duration increases to 120 seconds. Limit 3 Stealth Wards on the map per player. (Trinkets cannot be used in the first 30 seconds of a game. Selling a Trinket will disable Trinket use for 120 seconds).

Can only carry 3 Stealth Wards in inventory.

Click to Consume: Places an invisible ward that reveals the surrounding area for 3 minutes. Limit 3 Stealth Wards on the map per player.
